ch.i10a.reversi.gameplay
Class PlayerManager

java.lang.Object
  ch.i10a.reversi.gameplay.PlayerManager

public class PlayerManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages the players on the board. It knows the active player and handles the changement of it.

          sets the passValue to the active player (determining who has passed)
